text: Ruggero Leoncavallo (April 23, 1857 â€“ August 9, 1919) was an Italian opera composer and librettist. He is best known for his 1892 opera, I pagliacci. In 1906, he toured the United States with success. He was born in Naples, and died in Montecatini Terme, Tuscany. title: Ruggero Leoncavallo
